data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Astrakhan‘, Russia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Astrakhan‘, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Astrakhan‘, Russia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Astrakhan'. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 14,782 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kalmyk-Oirat people. Make the Kalmyk-Oirat people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, let it be said of the 995,318 lost in Astrakhan' that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: God, guide the 14,782 believers in Astrakhan' to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Astrakhan‘, Russia has a population of 1,010,100.

We estimate Astrakhan' has 14,782 people who might know Jesus, 566,951 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 428,367 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Astrakhan‘, Russia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
